faqs.question: What does this script create?
faqs.answer: Creates a complete Linktree-style site with 11ty static generation, Decap CMS admin interface, responsive design, and Netlify deployment configuration. Perfect for social media bio links!

faqs.question: How do I customize it?
faqs.answer: After running the script, edit src/_data/links.yml for content or use the CMS admin interface at /admin after deployment. The script shows exactly what it creates in the code section below.
